00032 CInputDialog::CInputDialog(const QString& caption, const QString& description, const QString& text, QWidget *parent, const char *name, const bool modal ) : KDialog(parent,name,modal) {
00033     setPlainCaption(caption);
00034     
00035     QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this, 5,5);
00036

00046         m_editWidget->selectAll();

00051     topLayout->addWidget(separator);
00052

00054     
00055     buttonLayout->addStretch(2);        
00056 
00057     QPushButton* cancel = new QPushButton(this);

00060     buttonLayout->addWidget(cancel,1);

00065     clear->setText(i18n("Clear"));

00089 const QString CInputDialog::getText( const QString& caption, const QString& description, const QString& text, bool* ok, QWidget* parent, bool modal){
00090     qDebug("CInputDialog::getText( const QString& caption, const QString& description, const QString& text, bool* ok, QWidget* parent, bool modal)");
00091 //  ASSERT(ok);
00092     
00093     CInputDialog* dlg = new CInputDialog(caption, description, text, parent, "", modal);    
00094     QString ret = QString::null;
00095         
00096     const bool isOk = (dlg->exec() == CInputDialog::Accepted);
00097     if (isOk)
00098         ret = dlg->text();
00099     if (ok)
00100         *ok = isOk;
00101     delete dlg;
00102     return ret;
00103 }
